Buyer: Hi, I’m looking for help with on-page SEO for our funeral home website. I want to improve our visibility on search engines and optimize our content.


Seller: Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out! I’d be happy to assist you with on-page SEO for your website. Are there specific pages or keywords you want to focus on, or would you like a general audit of the entire site?

Looking forward to your response.

Thank you.


Buyer: I’d like to optimize several key pages, including the Home, About, and Funeral Services pages. I also want to target keywords related to funeral services in Winnipeg.


Seller: Great! I’ll perform an on-page SEO analysis for those pages, focusing on keyword optimization, meta descriptions, and headers. I’ll also check for content quality, internal linking, and image optimization.

Would you like me to provide a list of suggested keywords to use, or do you already have some in mind?


Buyer: A list of suggested keywords would be helpful. I want to ensure we’re targeting the right terms.


Seller: I’ll conduct an on-page SEO analysis for the Home, About, and Funeral Services pages, providing keyword suggestions, meta description and header optimization, and checks for content quality, internal linking, and image optimization.

For this task, the charge will be $15 USD, and I’ll provide a detailed report with my recommendations within 7 days.

Does that work for you?


Buyer: Yes, that sounds perfect. Let’s proceed!


Custom Offer: As discussed,

- I’ll conduct an on-page SEO analysis for the Home, About, and Funeral Services pages.
- I’ll provide keyword optimization suggestions, including meta descriptions and headers.
- I’ll deliver a list of recommended keywords relevant to funeral services in Winnipeg.
- I’ll check for content quality, internal linking, and image optimization.

For this task, the charge will be $15 USD, and I’ll complete it within 7 days.

Please accept the offer to begin.

Thank you.

Buyer: Need a responsive mobile-first ElemetorPro & Woocommerce website built. It is for a landscape design and installation business in the US.
- create a unique, eye-catching design that is classic and timeless
- looking for great design skills
- this website needs to be unique, creative, and not the typical looking website in the industry
- looking for someone who is a great communicator, willing to try new things, creative, open-minded, like changing the status quo and pushing boundaries
- skilled in Elementor Pro, WordPress, and Woocommerce

Seller:  Hello There,

Thanks for reaching out to me. I’ve reviewed your requirements properly. I’d like to inform you that I do match your requirements properly.

As an expert developer, I assure you that I can perfectly assist you by developing a website for your Laundry dry cleaning and sneaker cleaning businesses using WordPress with an elegant and modern look.

Do you have any references or any design ideas in your mind?

Regards.

Buyer: Hello, Thanks for your quick response. I own a laundry business, and I need a website for it.

I have a  logo for it. Other things are not prepared yet. If we finalize the project, we will provide you with the other things later on. I don’t have any references, but I can provide some of them to take design ideas from.

Seller: Please provide me with those sites for my better ideas.

Buyer: https://e-laundryusa.com/home ,https://get.mangofreshlaundry.com/ ,https://tidecleaners.com/ 

You can take ideas from here Also, I’m open to your creativity. You can suggest to me if you have better solutions for it.

Thank you.

Seller: Thanks for sharing the sites with me. Please allow me some time to review them and get back to you shortly.

Buyer: Sure. Take your time and let me know if you can assist me with it.

Seller: Thanks for your time.

I’ve reviewed all of your reference sites. 

I assure you that I can perfectly assist you by developing a website for your laundry business following your references and using my creativity.

Could you please confirm me about the page numbers?

Buyer: Basic, 3 to 4 pages. What will be the estimated charge for it?

Seller: As per your requirement, I’ll develop a 4-page laundry website following references and make sure the site is modern and professional.

To make sure, I'll also serve you the following:

- Designing the website following your reference site will also use my own creativity and give it an elegant and user-friendly look.
- Create all the pages (Home, About, Services, Project, Contact page) with a fascinating look
- Attractive and eye-catching design as your reference.

For this entire task, I'll charge $150(USD) and complete this within the next 7 days.

Buyer: The charge is far more above then my budget. Right now, I can afford only 90$(USD)

What can you serve me with this budget?

Seller: Unfortunately, for this task, it’s a low budget.

We can go for 1-2 page websites with your required 6 pages. Instead of page, 

This will get fit into your budget.

Let me know your thoughts regarding my proposal.

Buyer: Ok, go for it.






Custom offer:  As per your requirement, I’ll develop a 1-2 page website with the following references and make sure the site is modern and professional.

To make sure, I'll also serve you the following:

- Designing the website following your reference site will also use my own creativity and give it an elegant and user-friendly look.
- Create all the pages (Home, About, Services, Project, Contact page) with a fascinating look
- Attractive and eye-catching design as your reference.

For this entire task, I'll charge $90 (USD) and complete it within the next 4 days.

Please accept the offer to get started.

Thank you

Thanks for reaching out. Yes, I can help you create your Shopify website. I’ll design and develop a professional site for SnW Gifts. Can you share the features and sections you’d like included?

Looking forward to your thoughts.

Thank you.


Buyer: Perfect! For the homepage, I want a feature banner that says Transform your gifting experience. Below that, I’d like sections for featured products, category-based shopping, and a banner highlighting “Free shipping over $55”.


Seller: Got it! I'll design a clean and vibrant homepage with a feature banner showcasing your brand message, followed by sections for featured products, product categories, and free shipping details.

What about the product pages and additional sections?


Buyer: For the product pages, I need each page to display the product name, price, description, and availability, with an “Add to Cart” button for available items and a “Sold Out” tag for unavailable ones. Also, include a footer with links to our policies and social media.


Seller: Understood. I’ll ensure the product pages include all the details and functionality you’ve mentioned. The footer will include links to policies like Privacy Policy, Refund Policy, and Terms of Service, along with social media icons for Instagram, Facebook, and others.

Does that cover everything, or is there more you'd like to include?


Buyer: Yes, I’d also like a newsletter signup form offering 10% off and a small FAQ section on the homepage to address common questions.


Seller: No problem! I’ll integrate a newsletter signup form to encourage subscriptions and create a concise FAQ section on the homepage to improve usability. I’ll ensure the design is cohesive and aligns with your brand’s style.

The cost of the project will be $100, and I’ll deliver it within 4 days.

Does that work for you or do you have any budget?


Buyer: My budget is $65. Can you do the project in my budget?


Seller: As this is our first work together I can do the project within your budget.

I’ll send over the custom offer shortly.


Custom Offer: As discussed,

- I’ll create a Shopify website for SnW Gifts, including a visually appealing homepage with a feature banner, sections for featured products, product categories, and free shipping details.
- I’ll design product pages with product names, descriptions, prices, and availability status, ensuring smooth navigation and an “Add to Cart” button.
- I’ll add a footer with policy links and social media icons.
- I’ll integrate a newsletter signup form offering 10% off and a concise FAQ section.
- The design will be cohesive and align with your brand’s style.

For the project, the cost will be $65 and I’ll deliver it within the next 4 days.

Please accept the offer to begin.

Thank you.
